name: MakerBot Industries LLC
description: Provider of desktop Three-dimensional(3D) printing technology. The company manufactures Three-dimensional(3D) desktop printers and components, as well as providing the MakerBot 3D Ecosystem, an online platform of 3D printing tools, including Thingiverse, a crowdsourced collection of downloadable digital designs.
one_liner: Provider of desktop Three-dimensional(3D) printing technology. The company manufactures Three-dimensional(3D) desktop printers and components, as well as providing the MakerBot 3D Ecosystem, an online platform of 3D printing tools, including Thingiverse, a crowdsourced collection of downloadable digital designs.
